overview: Miles Davis performing live at Berkshire Music Center, Tanglewood Massachusetts on August 18, 1970.  Miles Davis tp / Chick Corea el-p / Keith Jarrett org / Gary Bartz ss, as / Dave Holland el-b / Jack DeJohnette dr / Airto Moreira perc  1. Directions 2.  Bitches Brew 3. The Mask 4. It's About That Time 5. Sanctuary 6. Spanish Key 7. Miles Runs The Voodoo Down
title: Miles Davis Live At Tanglewood 1970
